```diff
- 
+ import { Injectable, ConflictException, NotFoundException, UnauthorizedException } from '@nestjs/common';
+ import { InjectRepository } from '@nestjs/typeorm';
+ import { Repository } from 'typeorm';
+ import { JwtService } from '@nestjs/jwt';
+ import * as bcrypt from 'bcrypt';
+ import { User } from '../../database/entities/user.entity';
+ import { CreateUserDto } from './dto/create-user.dto';
+ import { LoginDto } from './dto/login.dto';
+ 
+ @Injectable()
+ export class UsersService {
+   constructor(
+     @InjectRepository(User)
+     private readonly usersRepository: Repository<User>,
+     private readonly jwtService: JwtService,
+   ) {}
+ 
+   async create(createUserDto: CreateUserDto): Promise<User> {
+     // æ£€æŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·åæ˜¯å¦å·²å­˜åœ¨
+     const existingUser = await this.usersRepository.findOne({
+       where: { username: createUserDto.username },
+     });
+ 
+     if (existingUser) {
+       throw new ConflictException('ç”¨æˆ·åå·²å­˜åœ¨');
+     }
+ 
+     // åŠ å¯†å¯†ç 
+     const hashedPassword = await bcrypt.hash(createUserDto.password, 10);
+ 
+     // åˆ›å»ºæ–°ç”¨æˆ·
+     const user = this.usersRepository.create({
+       ...createUserDto,
+       password: hashedPassword,
+     });
+ 
+     return this.usersRepository.save(user);
+   }
+ 
+   async login(loginDto: LoginDto): Promise<{ token: string; user: Partial<User> }> {
+     const user = await this.usersRepository.findOne({
+       where: { username: loginDto.username },
+     });
+ 
+     if (!user) {
+       throw new UnauthorizedException('ç”¨æˆ·åæˆ–å¯†ç é”™è¯¯');
+     }
+ 
+     // éªŒè¯å¯†ç 
+     const isPasswordValid = await bcrypt.compare(loginDto.password, user.password);
+     if (!isPasswordValid) {
+       throw new UnauthorizedException('ç”¨æˆ·åæˆ–å¯†ç é”™è¯¯');
+     }
+ 
+     // ç”ŸæˆJWT token
+     const token = this.jwtService.sign({
+       id: user.id,
+       username: user.username,
+       role: user.role,
+     });
+ 
+     // è¿”å›tokenå’Œç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä¸åŒ…å«å¯†ç ï¼‰
+     const { password, ...userWithoutPassword } = user;
+     return {
+       token,
+       user: userWithoutPassword,
+     };
+   }
+ 
+   async findOne(id: number): Promise<User> {
+     const user = await this.usersRepository.findOne({
+       where: { id },
+     });
+ 
+     if (!user) {
+       throw new NotFoundException('ç”¨æˆ·ä¸å­˜åœ¨');
+     }
+ 
+     return user;
+   }
+ 
+   async findByUsername(username: string): Promise<User | undefined> {
+     return this.usersRepository.findOne({
+       where: { username },
+     });
+   }
+ } 
```

```diff
- 
+ import { Controller, Post, Body, Get, Param, UseGuards } from '@nestjs/common';
+ import { UsersService } from './users.service';
+ import { CreateUserDto } from './dto/create-user.dto';
+ import { LoginDto } from './dto/login.dto';
+ import { JwtAuthGuard } from '../../common/guards/jwt-auth.guard';
+ 
+ @Controller('users')
+ export class UsersController {
+   constructor(private readonly usersService: UsersService) {}
+ 
+   @Post('register')
+   async register(@Body() createUserDto: CreateUserDto) {
+     const user = await this.usersService.create(createUserDto);
+     const { password, ...result } = user;
+     return result;
+   }
+ 
+   @Post('login')
+   async login(@Body() loginDto: LoginDto) {
+     return this.usersService.login(loginDto);
+   }
+ 
+   @UseGuards(JwtAuthGuard)
+   @Get('profile')
+   async getProfile(@Request() req) {
+     const user = await this.usersService.findOne(req.user.id);
+     const { password, ...result } = user;
+     return result;
+   }
+ 
+   @UseGuards(JwtAuthGuard)
+   @Get(':id')
+   async findOne(@Param('id') id: string) {
+     const user = await this.usersService.findOne(+id);
+     const { password, ...result } = user;
+     return result;
+   }
+ } 
```

```diff
+ import { Module } from '@nestjs/common';
+ import { TypeOrmModule } from '@nestjs/typeorm';
+ import { JwtModule } from '@nestjs/jwt';
+ import { ConfigService } from '@nestjs/config';
+ import { User } from '../../database/entities/user.entity';
+ import { UsersController } from './users.controller';
+ import { UsersService } from './users.service';
+ 
+ @Module({
+   imports: [
+     TypeOrmModule.forFeature([User]),
+     JwtModule.registerAsync({
+       inject: [ConfigService],
+       useFactory: (configService: ConfigService) => ({
+         secret: configService.get('JWT_SECRET'),
+         signOptions: {
+           expiresIn: configService.get('JWT_EXPIRES_IN', '7d'),
+         },
+       }),
+     }),
+   ],
+   controllers: [UsersController],
+   providers: [UsersService],
+   exports: [UsersService],
+ })
+ export class UsersModule {}
```

```diff
+ import { Injectable, ExecutionContext, UnauthorizedException } from '@nestjs/common';
+ import { AuthGuard } from '@nestjs/passport';
+ import { JwtService } from '@nestjs/jwt';
+ 
+ @Injectable()
+ export class JwtAuthGuard extends AuthGuard('jwt') {
+   constructor(private jwtService: JwtService) {
+     super();
+   }
+ 
+   canActivate(context: ExecutionContext) {
+     const request = context.switchToHttp().getRequest();
+     const token = this.extractTokenFromHeader(request);
+     
+     if (!token) {
+       throw new UnauthorizedException('æœªæä¾›è®¤è¯ä»¤ç‰Œ');
+     }
+ 
+     try {
+       const payload = this.jwtService.verify(token);
+       request.user = payload;
+       return true;
+     } catch {
+       throw new UnauthorizedException('æ— æ•ˆçš„è®¤è¯ä»¤ç‰Œ');
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   private extractTokenFromHeader(request: any): string | undefined {
+     const [type, token] = request.headers.authorization?.split(' ') ?? [];
+     return type === 'Bearer' ? token : undefined;
+   }
+ } 
```

```diff
+ import { NestFactory } from '@nestjs/core';
+ import { ValidationPipe } from '@nestjs/common';
+ import { AppModule } from './app.module';
+ 
+ async function bootstrap() {
+   const app = await NestFactory.create(AppModule);
+ 
+   // é…ç½®å…¨å±€éªŒè¯ç®¡é“
+   app.useGlobalPipes(new ValidationPipe());
+ 
+   // é…ç½®CORS
+   app.enableCors();
```

```diff
+ import router from '../router';

+ // åˆ›å»ºaxioså®ä¾‹
+ const request = axios.create({
+   baseURL: 'http://localhost:3000/api', // åç«¯APIåŸºç¡€URL
+   timeout: 10000, // è¯·æ±‚è¶…æ—¶æ—¶é—´
+ });

+ request.interceptors.request.use(

+     // ä»localStorageè·å–token
+     const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
+     if (token) {
+       config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
+     }
+     return config;
+   },
+   (error) => {
+     return Promise.reject(error);
+   }
+ );

+ // å“åº”æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
+ request.interceptors.response.use(
+   (response) => {

+     if (error.response) {
```

```diff
+ import request from '../utils/request';
+ import type { User } from '../types/api';
+ 
+ /**
+  * è·å–ç”¨æˆ·åˆ—è¡¨
+  */
+ export const getUserList = (params?: {
+   page?: number;
+   pageSize?: number;
+   keyword?: string;
+   role?: string;
+ }) => {
+   return request.get<any, { items: User[]; total: number }>('/users', { params });
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * æ›´æ–°ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
+  */
+ export const updateUser = (id: number, data: Partial<User>) => {
+   return request.patch<any, User>(`/users/${id}`, data);
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * åˆ é™¤ç”¨æˆ·
+  */
+ export const deleteUser = (id: number) => {
+   return request.delete<any, void>(`/users/${id}`);
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * æ›´æ–°ç”¨æˆ·å¯†ç 
+  */
+ export const updatePassword = (id: number, data: {
+   oldPassword: string;
+   newPassword: string;
+ }) => {
+   return request.patch<any, void>(`/users/${id}/password`, data);
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * æ›´æ–°ç”¨æˆ·è§’è‰²
+  */
+ export const updateUserRole = (id: number, role: 'admin' | 'employee') => {
+   return request.patch<any, User>(`/users/${id}/role`, { role });
+ };
```

```diff
+         </el-button>

+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { ref, reactive, onMounted } from 'vue';
+ import { ElMessage, ElMessageBox } from 'element-plus';
+ import type { FormInstance, FormRules } from 'element-plus';
+ import { getUserList, register, updateUser, deleteUser, updatePassword } from '../../api/user';
+ import type { User } from '../../types/api';
+ 
+ // åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
+ const loading = ref(false);
+ const submitting = ref(false);
+ 
+ // è¡¨æ ¼æ•°æ®
+ const userList = ref<User[]>([]);
+ const total = ref(0);
+ const currentPage = ref(1);
+ const pageSize = ref(10);
+ 
+ // ç­›é€‰è¡¨å•
+ const filterForm = reactive({
+   keyword: '',
+   role: ''
+ });
+ 
+ // ç¼–è¾‘å¯¹è¯æ¡†
+ const editDialogVisible = ref(false);
+ const editFormRef = ref<FormInstance>();
+ const editingUser = reactive<Partial<User> & { password?: string }>({});
+ 
+ // å¯†ç å¯¹è¯æ¡†
+ const passwordDialogVisible = ref(false);
+ const passwordFormRef = ref<FormInstance>();
+ const passwordForm = reactive({
+   userId: 0,
+   oldPassword: '',
+   newPassword: '',
+   confirmPassword: ''
+ });
+ 
+ // è¡¨å•éªŒè¯è§„åˆ™
+ const editRules: FormRules = {
+   username: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·å', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 3, max: 20, message: 'é•¿åº¦åœ¨ 3 åˆ° 20 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   password: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥å¯†ç ', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 6, max: 20, message: 'é•¿åº¦åœ¨ 6 åˆ° 20 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   email: [
+     { type: 'email', message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„é‚®ç®±åœ°å€', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   phone: [
+     { pattern: /^1[3-9]\d{9}$/, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„æ‰‹æœºå·ç ', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   role: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·é€‰æ‹©ç”¨æˆ·è§’è‰²', trigger: 'change' }
+   ]
+ };
+ 
+ const passwordRules: FormRules = {
+   oldPassword: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æ—§å¯†ç ', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 6, max: 20, message: 'é•¿åº¦åœ¨ 6 åˆ° 20 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   newPassword: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æ–°å¯†ç ', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 6, max: 20, message: 'é•¿åº¦åœ¨ 6 åˆ° 20 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   confirmPassword: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·ç¡®è®¤å¯†ç ', trigger: 'blur' },
+     {
+       validator: (rule, value, callback) => {
+         if (value !== passwordForm.newPassword) {
+           callback(new Error('ä¸¤æ¬¡è¾“å…¥å¯†ç ä¸ä¸€è‡´'));
+         } else {
+           callback();
+         }
+       },
+       trigger: 'blur'
+     }
+   ]
+ };
+ 
+ // åˆå§‹åŒ–
+ onMounted(() => {
+   fetchUserList();
+ });
+ 
+ // è·å–ç”¨æˆ·åˆ—è¡¨
+ const fetchUserList = async () => {
+   try {
+     loading.value = true;
+     const params = {
+       page: currentPage.value,
+       pageSize: pageSize.value,
+       ...filterForm
+     };
+     const { items, total: totalCount } = await getUserList(params);
+     userList.value = items;
+     total.value = totalCount;
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('è·å–ç”¨æˆ·åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥:', error);
+     ElMessage.error('è·å–ç”¨æˆ·åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥');
+   } finally {
+     loading.value = false;
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ // æœç´¢
+ const handleSearch = () => {
+   currentPage.value = 1;
+   fetchUserList();
+ };
+ 
+ // é‡ç½®ç­›é€‰
+ const resetFilter = () => {
+   filterForm.keyword = '';
+   filterForm.role = '';
+   handleSearch();
+ };
+ 
+ // åˆ†é¡µ
+ const handleSizeChange = (val: number) => {
+   pageSize.value = val;
+   fetchUserList();
+ };
+ 
+ const handleCurrentChange = (val: number) => {
+   currentPage.value = val;
+   fetchUserList();
+ };
+ 
+ // åˆ›å»ºç”¨æˆ·
+ const handleCreate = () => {
+   Object.assign(editingUser, {
+     id: undefined,
+     username: '',
+     password: '',
+     role: 'employee',
+     realName: '',
+     email: '',
+     phone: ''
+   });
+   editDialogVisible.value = true;
+ };
+ 
+ // ç¼–è¾‘ç”¨æˆ·
+ const handleEdit = (row: User) => {
+   Object.assign(editingUser, row);
+   editDialogVisible.value = true;
+ };
+ 
+ // æäº¤ç¼–è¾‘
+ const handleSubmit = async () => {
+   if (!editFormRef.value) return;
+   
+   await editFormRef.value.validate(async (valid) => {
+     if (valid) {
+       try {
+         submitting.value = true;
+         if (editingUser.id) {
+           // æ›´æ–°ç”¨æˆ·
+           const { password, ...updateData } = editingUser;
+           await updateUser(editingUser.id, updateData);
+           ElMessage.success('æ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸ');
+         } else {
+           // åˆ›å»ºç”¨æˆ·
+           await register(editingUser as any);
+           ElMessage.success('åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸ');
+         }
+         editDialogVisible.value = false;
+         fetchUserList();
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥:', error);
+         ElMessage.error('æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·é‡è¯•');
+       } finally {
+         submitting.value = false;
+       }
+     }
+   });
+ };
+ 
+ // åˆ é™¤ç”¨æˆ·
+ const handleDelete = async (row: User) => {
+   try {
+     await ElMessageBox.confirm(
+       'ç¡®å®šè¦åˆ é™¤è¯¥ç”¨æˆ·å—ï¼Ÿæ­¤æ“ä½œä¸å¯æ¢å¤',
+       'è­¦å‘Š',
+       {
+         confirmButtonText: 'ç¡®å®š',
+         cancelButtonText: 'å–æ¶ˆ',
+         type: 'warning'
+       }
+     );
+     
+     await deleteUser(row.id);
+     ElMessage.success('åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ');
+     fetchUserList();
+   } catch (error) {
+     if (error !== 'cancel') {
+       console.error('åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥:', error);
+       ElMessage.error('åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·é‡è¯•');
+     }
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ // ä¿®æ”¹å¯†ç 
+ const handleChangePassword = (row: User) => {
+   passwordForm.userId = row.id;
+   passwordForm.oldPassword = '';
+   passwordForm.newPassword = '';
+   passwordForm.confirmPassword = '';
+   passwordDialogVisible.value = true;
+ };
+ 
+ // æäº¤å¯†ç ä¿®æ”¹
+ const handlePasswordSubmit = async () => {
+   if (!passwordFormRef.value) return;
+   
+   await passwordFormRef.value.validate(async (valid) => {
+     if (valid) {
+       try {
+         submitting.value = true;
+         await updatePassword(passwordForm.userId, {
+           oldPassword: passwordForm.oldPassword,
+           newPassword: passwordForm.newPassword
+         });
+         ElMessage.success('å¯†ç ä¿®æ”¹æˆåŠŸ');
+         passwordDialogVisible.value = false;
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('å¯†ç ä¿®æ”¹å¤±è´¥:', error);
+         ElMessage.error('å¯†ç ä¿®æ”¹å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·é‡è¯•');
+       } finally {
+         submitting.value = false;
+       }
+     }
+   });
+ };
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped>
+ .user-list-container {
+   padding: 20px;
+ }
+ 
+ .page-header {
+   display: flex;
```

```diff
  import { UsersService } from './users.service';
  import { CreateUserDto } from './dto/create-user.dto';
  export class UsersController {
    constructor(private readonly usersService: UsersService) {}
+ 
+   @UseGuards(JwtAuthGuard)
+   @Get()
+   async findAll(
+     @Query('page') page = 1,
+     @Query('pageSize') pageSize = 10,
+     @Query('keyword') keyword = '',
+     @Query('role') role = '',
+   ) {
+     return this.usersService.findAll({
+       page: +page,
+       pageSize: +pageSize,
+       keyword,
+       role,
+     });
+   }
```

```thinking
çœ‹æ¥éœ€è¦åœ¨ UsersService ä¸­å®ç° findAll æ–¹æ³•ã€‚è®©æˆ‘æ·»åŠ è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•:
```

```diff
  import { Injectable, ConflictException, NotFoundException, UnauthorizedException } from '@nestjs/common';
  import { InjectRepository } from '@nestjs/typeorm';
- import { Repository } from 'typeorm';
+ import { Repository, Like } from 'typeorm';
  import { JwtService } from '@nestjs/jwt';
  import * as bcrypt from 'bcrypt';
      });
    }
+ 
+   async findAll(params: {
+     page: number;
+     pageSize: number;
+     keyword?: string;
+     role?: string;
+   }) {
+     const { page, pageSize, keyword, role } = params;
+     const skip = (page - 1) * pageSize;
+ 
+     const queryBuilder = this.usersRepository.createQueryBuilder('user');
+ 
+     if (keyword) {
+       queryBuilder.where(
+         '(user.username LIKE :keyword OR user.realName LIKE :keyword OR user.email LIKE :keyword OR user.phone LIKE :keyword)',
+         { keyword: `%${keyword}%` },
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     if (role) {
+       queryBuilder.andWhere('user.role = :role', { role });
+     }
+ 
+     const [items, total] = await queryBuilder
+       .skip(skip)
+       .take(pageSize)
+       .getManyAndCount();
+ 
+     return {
+       items: items.map(item => {
+         const { password, ...rest } = item;
+         return rest;
+       }),
+       total,
+     };
+   }
  } 
```

```diff
+   }

+     return this.usersService.remove(+id);
+   }

+   @Patch(':id/password')
+   async updatePassword(
+     @Param('id') id: string,
+     @Body() updatePasswordDto: UpdatePasswordDto,
+   ) {
+     return this.usersService.updatePassword(+id, updatePasswordDto);
+   }

+   @UseGuards(JwtAuthGuard)
+   @Patch(':id/role')
+   async updateRole(
+     @Param('id') id: string,
+     @Body('role') role: string,
+   ) {
+     return this.usersService.updateRole(+id, role);
```

```diff
+ import { Module } from '@nestjs/common';
+ import { JwtModule } from '@nestjs/jwt';
+ import { PassportModule } from '@nestjs/passport';
+ import { ConfigModule, ConfigService } from '@nestjs/config';
+ import { JwtStrategy } from './strategies/jwt.strategy';
+ 
+ @Module({
+   imports: [
+     PassportModule.register({ defaultStrategy: 'jwt' }),
+     JwtModule.registerAsync({
+       imports: [ConfigModule],
+       inject: [ConfigService],
+       useFactory: (configService: ConfigService) => ({
+         secret: configService.get('JWT_SECRET') || 'liuchengwang_secret_key',
+         signOptions: {
+           expiresIn: '7d', // ä»¤ç‰Œæœ‰æ•ˆæœŸ7å¤©
+         },
+       }),
+     }),
+   ],

+ })
```

---

```diff
- 
+ import { Injectable, UnauthorizedException } from '@nestjs/common';
+ import { PassportStrategy } from '@nestjs/passport';
+ import { ExtractJwt, Strategy } from 'passport-jwt';
+ import { ConfigService } from '@nestjs/config';
+ import { UsersService } from '../../users/users.service';
+ 
+ @Injectable()
+ export class JwtStrategy extends PassportStrategy(Strategy) {
+   constructor(
+     private readonly configService: ConfigService,
+     private readonly usersService: UsersService,
+   ) {
+     super({
+       jwtFromRequest: ExtractJwt.fromAuthHeaderAsBearerToken(),
+       ignoreExpiration: false,
+       secretOrKey: configService.get('JWT_SECRET') || 'liuchengwang_secret_key',
+     });
+   }
+ 
+   async validate(payload: any) {
+     const user = await this.usersService.findOne(payload.id);
+     if (!user) {
+       throw new UnauthorizedException('ç”¨æˆ·ä¸å­˜åœ¨æˆ–å·²è¢«åˆ é™¤');
+     }
+     return { id: user.id, username: user.username, role: user.role };
+   }
+ } 
```

```diff
  export enum UserRole {
```

```diff
- 
+ import { Injectable, CanActivate, ExecutionContext, ForbiddenException } from '@nestjs/common';
+ import { Reflector } from '@nestjs/core';
+ import { UserRole } from '../../modules/users/entities/user.entity';
+ 
+ @Injectable()
+ export class RolesGuard implements CanActivate {
+   constructor(private reflector: Reflector) {}
+ 
+   canActivate(context: ExecutionContext): boolean {
+     const requiredRoles = this.reflector.getAllAndOverride<UserRole[]>('roles', [
+       context.getHandler(),
+       context.getClass(),
+     ]);
+ 
+     // å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰è®¾ç½®è§’è‰²è¦æ±‚ï¼Œåˆ™å…è®¸è®¿é—®
+     if (!requiredRoles || requiredRoles.length === 0) {
+       return true;
+     }
+ 
+     const { user } = context.switchToHttp().getRequest();
+     
+     // ç¡®ä¿ç”¨æˆ·å·²ç»é€šè¿‡è®¤è¯
+     if (!user) {
+       throw new ForbiddenException('æœªæˆæƒè®¿é—®');
+     }
+ 
+     // è¶…çº§ç®¡ç†å‘˜å¯ä»¥è®¿é—®æ‰€æœ‰å†…å®¹
+     if (user.role === UserRole.SUPER_ADMIN) {
+       return true;
+     }
+ 
+     // æ£€æŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·è§’è‰²æ˜¯å¦æ»¡è¶³è¦æ±‚
+     const hasRequiredRole = requiredRoles.some(role => user.role === role);
+     
+     if (!hasRequiredRole) {
+       throw new ForbiddenException('æ‚¨æ²¡æœ‰æƒé™æ‰§è¡Œæ­¤æ“ä½œ');
+     }
+     
+     return true;
+   }
+ }
```

```diff

+ import { Injectable } from '@nestjs/common';
+ import { PassportStrategy } from '@nestjs/passport';
+ import { ExtractJwt, Strategy } from 'passport-jwt';
+ import { ConfigService } from '@nestjs/config';
+ 
+ @Injectable()
+ export class JwtStrategy extends PassportStrategy(Strategy) {
+   constructor(private configService: ConfigService) {
+     super({
+       jwtFromRequest: ExtractJwt.fromAuthHeaderAsBearerToken(),
+       ignoreExpiration: false,
+       secretOrKey: configService.get<string>('JWT_SECRET'),
+     });
+   }
+ 
+   async validate(payload: any) {
+     return {
+       id: payload.id,
+       username: payload.username,
+       role: payload.role,
+     };
+   }
+ }
```

```diff

+ import { UserRole } from '../types/user';
+ 
+ /**
+  * æ£€æŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æƒé™è®¿é—®ç‰¹å®šåŠŸèƒ½
+  * @param userRole å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·è§’è‰²
+  * @param requiredRoles æ‰€éœ€è§’è‰²åˆ—è¡¨
+  * @returns æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æƒé™
+  */
+ export function hasPermission(userRole: UserRole, requiredRoles: UserRole[]): boolean {
+   // è¶…çº§ç®¡ç†å‘˜æ‹¥æœ‰æ‰€æœ‰æƒé™
+   if (userRole === UserRole.SUPER_ADMIN) {
+     return true;
+   }
+   
+   // æ£€æŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·è§’è‰²æ˜¯å¦åœ¨æ‰€éœ€è§’è‰²åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­
+   return requiredRoles.includes(userRole);
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * è·å–è§’è‰²åç§°
+  * @param role è§’è‰²æšä¸¾å€¼
+  * @returns è§’è‰²ä¸­æ–‡åç§°
+  */
+ export function getRoleName(role: UserRole): string {
+   const roleMap = {
+     [UserRole.SUPER_ADMIN]: 'è¶…çº§ç®¡ç†å‘˜',
+     [UserRole.PROJECT_ADMIN]: 'é¡¹ç›®ç®¡ç†å‘˜',
+     [UserRole.CONTENT_ADMIN]: 'å†…å®¹ç®¡ç†å‘˜',
+     [UserRole.EMPLOYEE]: 'æ™®é€šç”¨æˆ·',
+   };
+   
+   return roleMap[role] || 'æœªçŸ¥è§’è‰²';
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * è·å–æ‰€æœ‰è§’è‰²é€‰é¡¹ï¼Œç”¨äºä¸‹æ‹‰èœå•
+  * @param currentUserRole å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·è§’è‰²
+  * @returns è§’è‰²é€‰é¡¹åˆ—è¡¨
+  */
+ export function getRoleOptions(currentUserRole: UserRole): { label: string; value: string }[] {
+   const allRoles = [
+     { label: 'è¶…çº§ç®¡ç†å‘˜', value: UserRole.SUPER_ADMIN },
+     { label: 'é¡¹ç›®ç®¡ç†å‘˜', value: UserRole.PROJECT_ADMIN },
+     { label: 'å†…å®¹ç®¡ç†å‘˜', value: UserRole.CONTENT_ADMIN },
+     { label: 'æ™®é€šç”¨æˆ·', value: UserRole.EMPLOYEE },
+   ];
+   
+   // è¶…çº§ç®¡ç†å‘˜å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰è§’è‰²é€‰é¡¹
+   if (currentUserRole === UserRole.SUPER_ADMIN) {
+     return allRoles;
+   }
+   
+   // é¡¹ç›®ç®¡ç†å‘˜åªèƒ½çœ‹åˆ°é¡¹ç›®ç®¡ç†å‘˜ä»¥ä¸‹çš„è§’è‰²
+   if (currentUserRole === UserRole.PROJECT_ADMIN) {
+     return allRoles.filter(role => 
+       role.value !== UserRole.SUPER_ADMIN
+     );
+   }
+   
+   // å†…å®¹ç®¡ç†å‘˜åªèƒ½çœ‹åˆ°å†…å®¹ç®¡ç†å‘˜å’Œæ™®é€šç”¨æˆ·
+   if (currentUserRole === UserRole.CONTENT_ADMIN) {
+     return allRoles.filter(role => 
+       role.value === UserRole.CONTENT_ADMIN || role.value === UserRole.EMPLOYEE
+     );
+   }
+   
+   // æ™®é€šç”¨æˆ·åªèƒ½çœ‹åˆ°æ™®é€šç”¨æˆ·
+   return allRoles.filter(role => role.value === UserRole.EMPLOYEE);
+ }
```

```diff
+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { computed } from 'vue';
+ import { UserRole } from '../types/user';
+ import { getRoleName } from '../utils/permission';
+ 
+ const props = defineProps<{
+   role: UserRole;
+ }>();

+ // æ ¹æ®è§’è‰²ç±»å‹è®¾ç½®ä¸åŒçš„æ ‡ç­¾æ ·å¼
+ const tagType = computed(() => {
+   switch (props.role) {
+     case UserRole.SUPER_ADMIN:
+       return 'danger';
+     case UserRole.PROJECT_ADMIN:
+       return 'warning';
+     case UserRole.CONTENT_ADMIN:
+       return 'success';
+     case UserRole.EMPLOYEE:
+       return 'info';
+     default:
+       return '';
+   }
+ });
+ 
+ // è·å–è§’è‰²åç§°
```

```diff
+           <el-button @click="roleDialogVisible = false">å–æ¶ˆ</el-button>
+           <el-button type="primary" @click="submitRoleChange">ç¡®å®š</el-button>
+         </span>
+       </template>
+     </el-dialog>
+   </div>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { ref, reactive, computed, onMounted } from 'vue';
+ import { ElMessage, ElMessageBox } from 'element-plus';
+ import { Search, Plus } from '@element-plus/icons-vue';
+ import { useUserStore } from '../../stores/user';
+ import { getUserList, createUser, updateUser, deleteUser, updateUserRole } from '../../api/user';
+ import { formatDate } from '../../utils/format';
+ import { UserRole } from '../../types/user';
+ import { getRoleOptions, hasPermission } from '../../utils/permission';
+ import RoleTag from '../../components/RoleTag.vue';
+ 
+ const userStore = useUserStore();
+ const currentUser = computed(() => userStore.user);
+ 
+ // æƒé™æ§åˆ¶
+ const hasAddPermission = computed(() => 
+   hasPermission(currentUser.value.role, [UserRole.SUPER_ADMIN, UserRole.PROJECT_ADMIN])
+ );
+ const hasEditPermission = computed(() => 
+   hasPermission(currentUser.value.role, [UserRole.SUPER_ADMIN, UserRole.PROJECT_ADMIN])
+ );
+ const hasDeletePermission = computed(() => 
+   hasPermission(currentUser.value.role, [UserRole.SUPER_ADMIN])
+ );
+ const hasRolePermission = computed(() => 
+   hasPermission(currentUser.value.role, [UserRole.SUPER_ADMIN])
+ );
+ 
+ // è§’è‰²é€‰é¡¹
+ const roleOptions = computed(() => getRoleOptions(currentUser.value.role));
+ 
+ // åˆ—è¡¨æ•°æ®
+ const userList = ref([]);
+ const loading = ref(false);
+ const total = ref(0);
+ const currentPage = ref(1);
+ const pageSize = ref(10);
+ const searchKeyword = ref('');
+ const selectedRole = ref('');
+ 
+ // è¡¨å•æ•°æ®
+ const dialogVisible = ref(false);
+ const isEdit = ref(false);
+ const formRef = ref();
+ const form = reactive({
+   id: 0,
+   username: '',
+   realName: '',
+   password: '',
+   role: UserRole.EMPLOYEE,
+   email: '',
+   phone: '',
+ });
+ 
+ // è§’è‰²ä¿®æ”¹è¡¨å•
+ const roleDialogVisible = ref(false);
+ const roleFormRef = ref();
+ const roleForm = reactive({
+   userId: 0,
+   currentRole: '' as UserRole,
+   newRole: '' as UserRole,
+ });
+ 
+ // è¡¨å•éªŒè¯è§„åˆ™
+ const rules = {
+   username: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·å', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 3, max: 20, message: 'é•¿åº¦åœ¨ 3 åˆ° 20 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' },
+   ],
+   realName: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥å§“å', trigger: 'blur' },
+   ],
+   password: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥å¯†ç ', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 6, message: 'å¯†ç é•¿åº¦ä¸èƒ½å°äº 6 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' },
+   ],
+   email: [
+     { type: 'email', message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„é‚®ç®±åœ°å€', trigger: 'blur' },
+   ],
+ };
+ 
+ // è·å–ç”¨æˆ·åˆ—è¡¨
+ const fetchUserList = async () => {
+   loading.value = true;
+   try {
+     const res = await getUserList({
+       page: currentPage.value,
+       pageSize: pageSize.value,
+       keyword: searchKeyword.value,
+       role: selectedRole.value,
+     });
+     userList.value = res.items;
+     total.value = res.total;
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('è·å–ç”¨æˆ·åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥:', error);
+     ElMessage.error('è·å–ç”¨æˆ·åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥');
+   } finally {
+     loading.value = false;
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ // æœç´¢
+ const handleSearch = () => {
+   currentPage.value = 1;
+   fetchUserList();
+ };
+ 
+ // åˆ†é¡µ
+ const handleSizeChange = (val: number) => {
+   pageSize.value = val;
+   fetchUserList();
+ };
+ 
+ const handleCurrentChange = (val: number) => {
+   currentPage.value = val;
+   fetchUserList();
+ };
+ 
+ // æ·»åŠ ç”¨æˆ·
+ const handleAdd = () => {
+   isEdit.value = false;
+   form.id = 0;
+   form.username = '';
+   form.realName = '';
+   form.password = '';
+   form.role = UserRole.EMPLOYEE;
+   form.email = '';
+   form.phone = '';
+   dialogVisible.value = true;
+ };
+ 
+ // ç¼–è¾‘ç”¨æˆ·
+ const handleEdit = (row: any) => {
+   isEdit.value = true;
+   form.id = row.id;
+   form.username = row.username;
+   form.realName = row.realName;
+   form.password = '';
+   form.role = row.role;
+   form.email = row.email || '';
+   form.phone = row.phone || '';
+   dialogVisible.value = true;
+ };
+ 
+ // ä¿®æ”¹è§’è‰²
+ const handleChangeRole = (row: any) => {
+   roleForm.userId = row.id;
+   roleForm.currentRole = row.role;
+   roleForm.newRole = row.role;
+   roleDialogVisible.value = true;
+ };
+ 
+ // æäº¤è¡¨å•
+ const submitForm = async () => {
+   if (!formRef.value) return;
+   
+   await formRef.value.validate(async (valid: boolean) => {
+     if (valid) {
+       try {
+         if (isEdit.value) {
+           // ç¼–è¾‘ç”¨æˆ·
+           const { username, password, role, ...updateData } = form;
+           await updateUser(form.id, updateData);
+           ElMessage.success('æ›´æ–°ç”¨æˆ·æˆåŠŸ');
+         } else {
+           // æ·»åŠ ç”¨æˆ·
+           await createUser(form);
+           ElMessage.success('æ·»åŠ ç”¨æˆ·æˆåŠŸ');
+         }
+         dialogVisible.value = false;
+         fetchUserList();
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥:', error);
+         ElMessage.error('æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥');
+       }
+     }
+   });
+ };
+ 
+ // æäº¤è§’è‰²ä¿®æ”¹
+ const submitRoleChange = async () => {
+   if (roleForm.currentRole === roleForm.newRole) {
+     roleDialogVisible.value = false;
+     return;
+   }
+   
+   try {
+     await updateUserRole(roleForm.userId, roleForm.newRole);
+     ElMessage.success('è§’è‰²ä¿®æ”¹æˆåŠŸ');
+     roleDialogVisible.value = false;
+     fetchUserList();
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('ä¿®æ”¹è§’è‰²å¤±è´¥:', error);
+     ElMessage.error('ä¿®æ”¹è§’è‰²å¤±è´¥');
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ // åˆ é™¤ç”¨æˆ·
+ const handleDelete = (row: any) => {
+   ElMessageBox.confirm(
+     'ç¡®å®šè¦åˆ é™¤è¯¥ç”¨æˆ·å—ï¼Ÿæ­¤æ“ä½œä¸å¯æ¢å¤ã€‚',
+     'è­¦å‘Š',
+     {
+       confirmButtonText: 'ç¡®å®š',
+       cancelButtonText: 'å–æ¶ˆ',
+       type: 'warning',
+     }
+   )
+     .then(async () => {
+       try {
+         await deleteUser(row.id);
+         ElMessage.success('åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ');
+         fetchUserList();
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥:', error);
+         ElMessage.error('åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥');
+       }
+     })
+     .catch(() => {
+       // å–æ¶ˆåˆ é™¤
+     });
+ };
+ 
+ // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å¯ä»¥ä¿®æ”¹è§’è‰²
+ const canChangeRole = (user: any) => {
+   // ä¸èƒ½ä¿®æ”¹è‡ªå·±çš„è§’è‰²
+   if (user.id === currentUser.value.id) {
+     return false;
+   }
+   
+   // è¶…çº§ç®¡ç†å‘˜å¯ä»¥ä¿®æ”¹ä»»ä½•äººçš„è§’è‰²
+   if (currentUser.value.role === UserRole.SUPER_ADMIN) {
+     return true;
+   }
+   
+   return false;
+ };
+ 
+ // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å¯ä»¥åˆ é™¤ç”¨æˆ·
+ const canDelete = (user: any) => {
+   // ä¸èƒ½åˆ é™¤è‡ªå·±
+   if (user.id === currentUser.value.id) {
+     return false;
+   }
+   
+   // åªæœ‰è¶…çº§ç®¡ç†å‘˜å¯ä»¥åˆ é™¤ç”¨æˆ·
+   if (currentUser.value.role !== UserRole.SUPER_ADMIN) {
+     return false;
+   }
+   
+   // è¶…çº§ç®¡ç†å‘˜ä¸èƒ½è¢«åˆ é™¤ï¼ˆå‰ç«¯ä¿æŠ¤ï¼Œåç«¯ä¹Ÿæœ‰ä¿æŠ¤ï¼‰
+   if (user.role === UserRole.SUPER_ADMIN) {
+     return false;
+   }
+   
+   return true;
+ };
+ 
+ onMounted(() => {
+   fetchUserList();
+ });
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped>
+ .user-list-container {
+   padding: 20px;
+ }
+ 
+ .header {
+   display: flex;
+   justify-content: space-between;
+   align-items: center;
+   margin-bottom: 20px;
+ }
+ 
+ .actions {
+   display: flex;
+   align-items: center;
+ }
+ 
+ .pagination {
+   margin-top: 20px;
+   display: flex;
+   justify-content: flex-end;
+ }
+ </style>
```

```diff
+   if (!issueForm.startDate) return false;

+ };

+ // å¤„ç†å¼€å§‹æ—¥æœŸå˜åŒ–
+ const handleStartDateChange = () => {
+   if (issueForm.startDate && issueForm.expectedEndDate) {
+     const start = new Date(issueForm.startDate);
+     const end = new Date(issueForm.expectedEndDate);
+     if (end < start) {
+       issueForm.expectedEndDate = '';
+       issueForm.durationDays = undefined;
+     } else {
+       const diffTime = Math.abs(end.getTime() - start.getTime());
+       issueForm.durationDays = Math.ceil(diffTime / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
+     }
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†ç»“æŸæ—¥æœŸå˜åŒ–
+ const handleEndDateChange = () => {
+   if (issueForm.startDate && issueForm.expectedEndDate) {
+     const start = new Date(issueForm.startDate);
+     const end = new Date(issueForm.expectedEndDate);
+     const diffTime = Math.abs(end.getTime() - start.getTime());
+     issueForm.durationDays = Math.ceil(diffTime / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†æŒç»­å¤©æ•°å˜åŒ–
+ const handleDurationChange = () => {
+   if (issueForm.startDate && issueForm.durationDays) {
+     const start = new Date(issueForm.startDate);
+     const end = new Date(start);
+     end.setDate(start.getDate() + issueForm.durationDays);
+     issueForm.expectedEndDate = end.toISOString().split('T')[0];
+   }
+ };
```

```diff
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥é¡¹ç›®åç§°', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 2, max: 50, message: 'é•¿åº¦åº”ä¸º2-50ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   password: [
+     { min: 6, max: 20, message: 'å¯†ç é•¿åº¦åº”ä¸º6-20ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ]
+ });
  
  // åˆå§‹åŒ–
    }
  };

+ // æ‰“å¼€ç¼–è¾‘å¯¹è¯æ¡†
+ const editProject = (project: any) => {
+   editForm.id = project.id;
+   editForm.name = project.name;
+   editForm.password = project.password || ''; // å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰å¯†ç å­—æ®µ,é»˜è®¤ä¸ºç©ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²
+   editDialogVisible.value = true;
+ };

+ const handleSaveEdit = async () => {
+   if (!editFormRef.value) return;
+   
+   await editFormRef.value.validate(async (valid: boolean) => {
+     if (valid) {
+       try {
+         saveLoading.value = true;
+         
+         // ä»localStorageè·å–é¡¹ç›®æ•°æ®
+         const storedProjects = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('projects') || '[]');
+         
+         // æ‰¾åˆ°å¹¶æ›´æ–°é¡¹ç›®
+         const index = storedProjects.findIndex((p: any) => p.id === editForm.id);
+         if (index !== -1) {
+           // ä¿ç•™åŸæœ‰å­—æ®µ,åªæ›´æ–°nameå’Œpassword
+           storedProjects[index] = {
+             ...storedProjects[index],
+             name: editForm.name,
+             password: editForm.password
+           };
+           
+           // ä¿å­˜å›localStorage
+           localStorage.setItem('projects', JSON.stringify(storedProjects));
+           
+           // æ›´æ–°å½“å‰æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„é¡¹ç›®åˆ—è¡¨
+           const projectIndex = projectList.value.findIndex(p => p.id === editForm.id);
+           if (projectIndex !== -1) {
+             projectList.value[projectIndex].name = editForm.name;
+             projectList.value[projectIndex].password = editForm.password;
+           }
+           
+           ElMessage.success('é¡¹ç›®æ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸ');
+           editDialogVisible.value = false;
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('æ›´æ–°é¡¹ç›®å¤±è´¥:', error);
+         ElMessage.error('æ›´æ–°é¡¹ç›®å¤±è´¥');
+       } finally {
+         saveLoading.value = false;
+       }
+     }
+   });
+ };
  </script>
```
